"Meow! Let us all fight togther!":
"Meow! Do <%me> know about fighting together?
During the battle, together with the ARKS people,
we watch out for each other, and it is a good
and wonderful thing. <%me> would also like to try
fighting together with Toro! Meow!
*Success in fighting together with the
Toro and Kuro in the street [Travelling together with
Toro and Kuro not allowed during the quest]
Limited to the [Waters of the Magic with the
arrival of the Concrete Dragon]"
"みんなでいっしょに共闘ニャ！"

"<%me>は
共闘って知ってるニャ？
戦いの中で出会ったアークスさん同士で
背中を預けあう、とってもステキで
かっこいいことらしいのニャ。
トロも<%me>と
いっしょに共闘してみたいのニャ～！
※道中にいるトロ・クロとの共闘を成功
『クエストにトロ・クロ同行不可』
